user_query: I am planning a surprise date for my partner Chloe and need some ideas. Can you calculate our match percentage using the Love Calculator API? Also, suggest a movie with the IMDb id tt6105098 and provide its showtimes.

TaskList.description: Calculate the match percentage between the user and their partner using the Love Calculator API.
Retrieve movie information and showtimes for the movie with IMDb id tt6105098.
